short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Realtime multiple currency converter, percentage, simple interest calculator & you can check your age with days, months and years

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-> By using this extension you can know the value of your currency with their symbols

-> By using this extension you can calculate simple interest

-> By using this extension you can calculate compound interest 

-> By using this extension you can know your age with number of years, months, days and minutes. 

-> By using this extension you can calculate number of days in between 2 dates.

-> By using this extension you can calculate percentage
